sections.heading: Action matured or acquired after pleadingAn action which either matured or was acquired by the defendant in the principal action after answer may be presented, with the permission of the court, as a reconventional demand by supplemental pleading
sections.text: Action matured or acquired after pleadingAn action which either matured or was acquired by the defendant in the principal action after answer may be presented, with the permission of the court, as a reconventional demand by supplemental pleading.
